pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, April 30, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister, accompanied by Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan, Chief of the Defence Staff General Jonathan Vance, and Deputy Minister of National Defence Jody Thomas, will provide an update on a Canadian helicopter involved in Op REASSURANCE that has gone missing off the coast of Greece.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7527
    Toll-free: 1-888-265-0903
    Pass code: 3418355#
